segments.text: Have you ever found yourself in a situation when you have to lie to people who trust you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you mean lying to people for their good ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Is it wrong to lie to them even if it is for their good ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's hard to say . I mean , how can you judge what's good for them ? Maybe it is best to tell them the truth no matter what it is .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But sometimes it is so hard to tell the truth .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . If you're sure the truth will do harm , maybe you can choose not to tell it .
segments.speaker: S2
